name: Online Payments for Students at University of Namibia
description: This platform helps the University of Namibia collect millions of dollars online. It is used by more than 25,000 students to make online payments for their tuition and registration fees.

name: Newspaper Circulation & Distribution System
description: A system that manages the entire newspaper distribution process. Key features include; Projections for the following day, Client management, Invoicing, Delivery notes, Routes management, Route grouping, Reports, Subscriptions management.

name: Student Management System
description: A Student Management System for high schools and small tutorial colleges with the following features: Student Management, Enrollment Management, Invoicing, Payments tracker, Credit & Debit notes, Subject management, Extra fees management

name: Rent-a-Car
description: A simple project that allows users to browse through cars and be able to add them to their favorites.
stack: Ruby on Rails, Postgres, React JS, Redux, Pair Programming, Remote

name: Covid Tracker Project
description: A simple project that tracks the number of corona active cases, recoveries and deaths across all the countries in the world.
